Actions.click-button: Alternative to click, use this if click is causing issues for buttons
Actions.get-text: Gets the text for a specified element.
Actions.fill-textbox: Fills the selected textbox with the specified value.
Actions.select-dropdown-element: Selects an element from within a dropdown menu.
Actions.save-as-html: Saves the current pages HTML to a file with the specified name.
Actions.take-screenshot: Takes a screenshot of the browser after executing the previous line.
Actions.wait-for-seconds: Waits for the specified number of seconds before continuing.

Features.bypass-cloudflare: Instructs the browser to use a more advanced approach to bypass cloudflare
Features.use-http-proxy: Uses the entered http proxy for the session.
Features.use-https-proxy: Uses the entered https proxy for the session.
Features.use-socks4-proxy: Uses the entered socks4 proxy for the session.
Features.use-socks5-proxy: Uses the entered socks5 proxy for the session.
